Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: bright blue and red lights spinning moving back forth across sky
divs: Sighting Detailsit was like 12:05 i was at home going to sleep and then my aunt screamed at me to look outside through the window i looked and there were two flying objects in the sky infront of my nieghbors yard at first i thought it was an airplane i ran and told my mom and me and my mom and aunt went outside to look what they were i saw one moving to the right then disappear then i saw two more to the left there was one just hovering in the sky i told my aunt to get in my car to go look closer but she said no i got in my car and went off to see what they were they disappeared except one that i found near lancaster and oakland as i accelerated it would move faster then i followed it to the anttena for the news station in front of the store new quick way shopping on meadowbrook it looked like it landed on the anttena then the lights turned off what gave it away that it was not an airplane is that it was going to the right then it stopped immediatly then went left fast and i mean fast
